committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: To restrict concessionaire contracts for accommodations, facilities, and services in areas administered by the National Park Service, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Prohibits the Secretary of the Interior or any Federal agency from: (1) entering into a contract or agreement for concessions for accommodations, facilities, or services in National Park Service areas with a foreign citizen, foreign corporation, or other foreign entity; or (2) transferring or assigning such contract or agreement to a foreign citizen, corporation, or entity. Authorizes the Secretary to waive such prohibition in specified circumstances, and requires publication of the reasons for such a waiver in the Federal Register.

titles.title: To restrict concessionaire contracts for accommodations, facilities, and services in areas administered by the National Park Service, and for other purposes.
